title: Now The Water
lyrics:
I'll let the water run
Lower myself into it
Delivers me
And I become clean
I'd give it all to you

To become one with myself

Your body

Moves slowly



Oh I feel it deeper now

And I think that it's better somehow



(Give into it)

I shut off all the lights

(You've been waiting, you deserve it)

And beneath the darkness

(Come and take me)

I hold my breath

And just wait for it



Oh I feel it deeper now

And I think that it's better somehow

Red clutch farm kid not making a sound

Now the waters all over the ground
